message: Degraded access following necessary system rollback. Users must rejoin the server to restore full data access.

incident.impactSummary: Users must manually rejoin the system to restore access to historical data following a deployment rollback.
incident.rootCause: Prior deployment/fix attempt instability requiring immediate system rollback.
incident.mitigation: System rollback successfully deployed. Full restoration requires user action (rejoining the server).
incident.detection: Automated system monitoring or user reports of instability.
actionItems: Communicate user action requirement (rejoining the server).
Monitor user connection and data synchronization rates.
Monitor status of external Roblox API
Investigate potential temporary data caching solutions
Track user reporting and ensure data access is fully restored upon user rejoin.

postmortemPlan.summary: Analyze the failed deployment/fix that necessitated the rollback and identify controls to prevent future user-impacting data access issues.
actionItems: Review deployment process leading to the failed fix.
Implement better canary deployment checks for data integrity.

timeline.event: System rollback pushed following unsuccessful fix attempt.
Confirmed root cause: External Roblox API down, preventing data access.
Rollback pushed and completed following a fix.

communications.message: rollback status to degraded: Rollback has been pushed following a fix. Users must rejoin the server to restore access to old data.
